availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Johnson Zimmerman in Hickman County on August 13, 1857. Blacksmith with Jefferson Searcy, William Searcy, Preston Watts, and Silas Ragan in Anderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Appointed as postmaster for Clinton, Kentucky, on April 9, 1857. Master smith in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 211B.
